title: I can't comment on patch notes or any other post.
body:
I basically can't comment. It says "so sad, you{{champion:32}}  are not authorized". Literally with amumu's pic in there:/ 
Anyone care to explain what is going on ?

replies.body: Where are you trying to comment?  Wherever it is, check the top right and make sure that you are logged into the correct account AND region!  Sometimes you might be on the wrong region so it's not sync'd up correctly.  Otherwise, your post here may have fixed you up!
I think it's the 'clear your browser cache problem'  I don't remember how to solve it for the OP.
